message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
My turn! How about a slightly better split for me this time?  55/45?
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going below 58-42!
This is getting ridiculous. I'm losing money every round! 52/48 is my final offer.
You're running out of time, Bob! 57-43 is my new offer.
Alice, let's be real.  The clock is ticking and we both lose if this goes any further. 50/50 is the only fair deal at this point.
You're getting desperate, Bob! 56-44 is my new offer. Don't risk losing everything!
